Have any questions?

Contact us at our various offices

United States

Memphis

Informa Economics Memphis serves as the base for all the firm's operations.

Washington

Informa Economics Washington specializes in the analysis of government policies, programs and regulations.

It is also home to Informa's Feed Ingredients Group. This business unit provides price discovery, publications, analysis, consulting and cross-hedging analysis on co-products produced or used in the feed, rendering, cottonseed, grain milling, pet food, biodiesel, ethanol and oleo chemicals industries.

Address

Informa Economics

3464 Washington Drive, Suite 120

Eagan, Minnesota USA 55122-1438

info@informaecon.com

651.925.1060
